BaseLevel.tooltip: optionally give a default amount of the fetish, regardless if it is selected by the player in the creation menu. Give it a string of 0 if you do not wish to use it.

CreationOn.tooltip: The provided strings will be the dialogue the Goddess gives in the creation menu when starting a new game. CreationOn being if the player selects the fetish, CreationOff: if the player unselects the fetish.
CreationOn.default: placeholder. Required for Addiction to not break the game.

CreationOff.tooltip: The provided strings will be the dialogue the Goddess gives in the creation menu when starting a new game. CreationOn: being if the player selects the fetish, CreationOff: if the player unselects the fetish.
